channel.title: Help me please! i dont knmow what is wrong
channel.description:
i have done everything i can think and it still wont let people get on my server...
i can log into my server when i use the ip 0.0.0.0... but how can i set it wo where other people can log into my sever and play

item.title: Help me please! i dont knmow what is wrong
item.dc:creator: @booster booster
item.description:
@booster wrote:

first you need to run your server then put your ip on no-ip.com and then out ti on server status page and other people should be able to long on it. but if you have a router ddo that first do portforwording
